```
FOREVER
  ALT
    from.client ? request && workerfree
      SEQ
        workerfree = false
        to.worker ! request
    from.worker ? result
      SEQ
        workerfree = true
        to.client ! result
```

```
PAR
  SEQ
    sleep( delay )
    timeout ! true
  ALT
    in.data ? data
      // respond to data
    timeout ? now
      // data timed out
```
